title: 2 bottles are without recycling number >> 2 bottles have  fuzzy number >> Which plastic is used for these????
Awsome product
I don't have any complaint
Much better than the regular bottles
Amazing original product at comfortable price
1 bottle ,not upto the mark
Quality Water bottles
Big Names selling filth on Amazon
Excellent bottles but number not mentioned clearly.

review:
Buying plastic ware ? You must Check recycling number.  
No brand is above board. For your health and well being you must be vigilant.
Many premium water bottles are been sold as safe but are actually PET or with
harmful plastics.  
>>> The recycling numbers 1, 3, 6 and 7 should be avoided for use as water
bottles. These numbers are indicated inside the triangular recycling symbol.  
  
In the product description there is no mention of the type of plastic used or
the recycling numbers . Virgin plastic and food safe plastic are vague terms
and don't indicate the kind of plastic used.  
  
The first thing I checked after unpacking the bottles was the bottom where the
recycling number is indicated inside a triangle.  
Two bottles have the triangle and two don't !!  
The number inside the triangle is not easy to read. This is the most important
part of the bottle meant for water storage. Why is Tupperware not transparent
with sharing the recycling numbers. Are they selling inferior quality to us
Indians? From different angles they appear as different numbers.  
What type of plastic is used for making these bottles? With out recycling
numbers there is no guarantee of safety 👎  
  
Ergonomics, color, looks are all secondary in a water bottle.  
The most important aspect is the safety. The water we shall consume from these
bottles every day has to be free from chemicals that can get leached into it
from the bad plastic.  
  
They are good looking and well designed bottles  
I received , blue, green, yellow and orange colours. They are transparent and
the caps fit well and are leak proof.  
No issues with the appearance but quality of plastic ?????  
I think the Number on two bottles is five. Numbers 2, 4 and 5 are safe
plastics.  
I returned H2O bottles from cello as they had recycling No. 1 clearly marked
in the bottom but the Tupperware bottles don't even show the number clearly.  
  
Not expected this from Tupperware. 👎

Awsome product had previously given 1 star and on both occassions the review
was not posted.  
These are not original Tupperware there is no #5 mark which is present in all
Tupperware products.  
Also the material seems to be very light will definately break if falls down.  
Had returned the product and got refund.

I had purchased Tupperware Aquasafe Water Bottle Set a year back, and I've
overall good experience.  
  
Here are my observations:  
  
1\. The product looks similar to its pics on Amazon.  
2\. These bottles are very durable. Easy to clean. No issue of foul smell. The
look is perfect.  
3\. The product is as per my expectation, and I don't have any complaint as
such.  
4\. Tupperware products have always been costly. So the cost of bottles didn't
surprise me.  
  
Verdict: I don't have any complaint

I received four different colored bottles in a plastic bag but there was no
damage or dents to the bottles. The Tupperware logo is embossed on the bottles
and caps so I think it should be genuine. The quality of the plastic is much
better than the regular bottles found in the marketplace. I personally prefer
all bottles in the same color but the advantage of different colored bottles
is that they don't get mixed up when traveling in a group. Amazon should also
take care to package them better.

All bottles(4bottles) are original and it is original Tupperware at cheap
price just 575 rupees. In recycle mark 5 is written so it is original
Tupperware. I have received bottles in 4 different colour green Orange Yellow
and violet.

I ordered 4 sets of these and all bottles were Tupperware brandished however
,1 bottle even though of Tupperware was of lower quality plastic and i think
that's the reason why you are getting it this cheap ,but all in all good
product in good price

These are good quality bottles grade 5 plastic manufactured and can be use for
daily water consumption, just select cloudtail seller for genuine product

The bottle stinks while drinking water from it. Although the product is from
Tupperware, i doubt the originality of the same. Such products are sold by
Amazon without any verification gives a bad name. Even after several washes
using detergents, liquid soaps, the smell remains intact. Amazon should
replace the product immediately.

I have reduced 1 star because at the bottom of the bottle number being
mentioned is blurry but it seems to be 5. Under the cap of it is clearly
written 5 inside the triangle.  
Packing was amazing and I recieved all the caps along with bottle. You will
need to wash it properly after purchase because little bit of foul smell was
coming out of it.  
I found it to be durable because one of them slipped out of my hand and not a
scratch was found on it.

Don't know whether it's a genuine product but d quality of d bottles is not
that good as we get d Tupperware bottles in local market. It has a embossed
logo of Tupperware. Thanks to Amazon as we got d product b4 time. Rated 3
stars bcoz of Amazon service. But didn't like d product quality.

No damage or scratches, was packed neatly and delivered promptly. Don't think
twice, go for it.  
The bottles are of 1 litre and should be preferably used for home use or on
long journeys. Its not very suitable as a school water bottle because of size.

If one wants to use any food grade plastic stuff, Tupperware is the brand of
choice (now being made at Dehradun, Uttarakhand). The other well known
American brand Rubbermaid is still relatively unavailable in India. Great
product and funky colours!

Excellent quality bottles at an affordable price! The multicoloured bottles
add to the aesthetic appeal. The bottles were well packed and in good
condition. Delivery was made before the expected date. Quite satisfied with
the product & service.

Please don't buy it... It stinks everyday.. Even low grade plastic bottles
will not be like this...4 bottles and u cannot even return them..u cannot even
figure out what grade plastic the bottle is 5/6. Didn't expect this from
Tupperware.

Very best material used in this bottle . Its quality is awesome and it was a
lifetime use product. I recommended this product to buy it. When we cool water
in it it does not get normal easily it taks times so it was a amazing item for
use.

The bottles should be fully prewashed to remove the plastic taste and smell.
The product still changes smell and taste of water sheet after weeks.

I was confused between H2O by Cello and Tupperware and I went for this one
after I found that Cello bottles don't react well to hot temperatures. The

during a lightning deal :)

I have received them in good package and everything looks fine.  
You may get cheaper bottles than this, when you consider the quality, do opt
for this!. You can self-acknowledge the difference by checking the number
printed inside the recycle symbol of any plastic item. number 5 as of far i
know denotes virgin plastic and Tupperware has only those.  
so, This is a nice combo of bottles to buy.

Received a colourful set; very good quality bottles (it is, however,
recommended to not use the same plastic container for too long). They have

Recall one of them had a weird odour that went away after soaking all bottles
in warm water.

this with a fork and thats very good quality ♎. I felt cheated 2nd time. Be

Observed typical good qualities of Tupperware  
1\. Sturdy bottles - won't break if dropped by mistake  
2\. Leak proof bottle - Water never leaks from bottle and one can safely put
them in laptop bags without thinking of water being spilled inside bag.

Bottles are as per the shown pics and description. The recycle number is 5.

delivery. Thank you Tupperware!

Great product, clear, solid bottles. good bright colors. 1 liter capacity.
Delivered in perfect condition. very handy.  
I will recommend them.

The product quality is very good, no doubt. But it is pricey. After all for a
set of 4 plastic (okay good plastic) the max price is Rs 940. I feel even
after discount which is Rs 665 for 4 bottles is very high. Otherwise I liked
the colours , the quality and design.

I haven't single Negative feedback, it's just awesome as mentioned in bottle
discription . Thank you Tupperware & Amazon for such a great deal.
